title: Lal Bikes Supre Drive splits the traditional derailleur for high pivot mountain bikes
content:
Canadian mechanical engineer, Cedric Eveleigh, has reinvented the mountain bike drivetrain specifically for high pivot suspension platforms. The Lal Bikes Supre Drive takes advantage of the space above the chainring to move the chain tensioning function of traditional derailleurs to the bottom bracket area, leaving the shifting mechanism at the rear wheel.
